title: Why Trump Keeps Losing Climate Cases in Court
itunes:title: Why Trump Keeps Losing Climate Cases in Court
description:
Pat Parenteau, a professor of environmental law at Vermont Law School, discusses a string of courtroom defeats for President Trump because federal agencies have not adequately considered the consequences to a warming planet. June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
